name: The Dutchmans Last Flight - OGA Summer Jam
name_original: The Dutchmans Last Flight - OGA Summer Jam
description:
The Flying Dutchman has been spotted on the high seas and it's up to you to destroy the famous ghost ship!

Made for the OGA Summer Jam #4.

----------------------
Controls when sailing
----------------------
Move - arrow keys or WASD.
To battle the Flying Dutchman, collide with it.

----------------------
Controls when bombing
----------------------
Move - Up/Down arrows, or W/S.
Throw Bomb - Hold Space to aim
